title: FlexPay Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator
summary: FlexPay offers a calculator to estimate additional revenue and customer growth through its Invisible Recovery solution. The tool helps businesses understand the impact of failed payment recovery on their revenue and customer lifetime value.
key_points: Calculate estimated 12-month revenue and customer growth with FlexPay Invisible Recovery.
Input fields include monthly active accounts, average billing, new sales growth, failed payment rate, and customer lifecycle.
Compares revenue and customer growth forecasts with no recovery solution, current solution, and FlexPay solution.
Focuses on reducing involuntary churn for subscription businesses.
Aims to increase revenue, customer LTV, and retention.
